name: Twisted Fate Gambler
rules_text:
When I attack, reveal the top rune of your rune deck, then recycle it. Do one of the following based on its domain:
- Deal 2 to an enemy unit here and 1 to all other enemy units here.
- Draw 1.
- Stun an enemy unit.

params.summary: Reveal top rune of your rune deck, recycle it, and do an action based on its domain.
